name: Book Binding - November 09
description:
When: Saturday, Nov 09
What time: 09:30am - 11:30am
Where: Pigment in North Park - 3801 30th St. San Diego, CA
How much: $40
Includes: workshop, sweets, sips and a fun goodie bag.

Join us on Saturday, Nov 9th from 09:30 AM to 11:30 AM for our book binding workshop at Pigment, a carefully curated one-stop shop for art, flora, furniture and thoughtful gifts in the heart of North Park, San Diego. You'll learn how to fold, stitch and bind your own personalized notebooks and journals.  Just in time for the holiday season, they make perfect gifts for any occasion.

You will leave with a couple handmade books, detailed instructions, and the skills to create more on your own. 

All supplies will be provided.  Just bring your camera to take pictures of your beautiful craft and new friends you will meet :)

Workshop is being hosted by Ana of We Love Citrus & Jen of My Three Sons Design.  Marcie of REDSTAR  Ink will be leading the class.  Marcie is an extraordinary graphic designer with more than 10 years of experience.  Her shop REDSTAR ink is filled with simple, bold and modern handmade paper goods.  You can learn more about her at www.redstarink.com.

Important:  Tickets are non refundable. Space is limited.

name: Tote Design  - September 15
description:
Join us on Sunday, September 15th from 10:00 AM to 12:00 PM for our canvas tote design workshop at Progress, a modern boutique shop in South Park, San Diego. We'll show you how to create a one-of-a-kind tote bag incorporating hand printing, embroidery and other surface design techniques.  

Craft, mingle, drink, eat and go home with a fun goodie bag!

All supplies will be provided.

Important:  Tickets are non refundable.  Space is limited so reserve yours ASAP.

name: String Art - June 08
description:
Come out and join us on Saturday, June 8th from 1:30 PM to 3:30 PM  for our string art workshop in lovely South Park, San Diego.  We'll craft, mingle, drink, eat and have fun!

We'll provide:
- 12″ x 12″ pre-cut wood
- nails
- strings
- light refreshments and a surprise goodie bag will be included as well. 

We need you to bring:
- a hammer
- something to trace (we’ll have print outs of the state of California, but if you have something specific in mind, please bring a print out of the basic image outline. Please keep in mind the size of the pre-cut wood.) 

Important:  All tickets are non refundable.  Workshop address will be emailed after registration.
